name: Striker Group Cabin Boy Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Moves quickly, but can't use his weapon very well.

name: Striker Group Crew Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinks a spear is better than a sword because of its superior reach.

name: Shooter Group Cabin Boy Green Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Neglects his chores, but always keeps his pistol clean.

name: Shooter Group Crew Green Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Confident that he can handle any type of gun.

name: Knuckle Millions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Frontier Agents. Joined the group on a whim before realizing how harsh the punishments were for messing up a job.

name: Knuckle Billions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Officer Agents. A potential future Frontier Agent candidate.

name: Bodyguard, 'Sunglasses'
desc: Bodyguard who protects Kaya's mansion. He always wears sunglasses. During the execution of Captain Kuro's plan, he took a leave of absence from the mansion.

name: Slasher Group Cabin Boy Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Concentrates on mental training rather than combat.

name: Slasher Group Crew Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. He secretly names his best combat moves but has never told anyone out of shame.

name: Nezumi
desc: Captain of the Navy's 16th Branch. He was taking bribes from Arlong and tried to steal the money Nami was saving.

name: Shooter Group Cabin Boy Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Hopes to become a cold-blooded sniper.

name: Shooter Group Crew Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. He's got a steady trigger finger even in the middle of battle.

name: Slasher Group Cabin Boy Green Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. He's great at visualizing and combat theory for battles.

name: Striker Group Cabin Boy Green Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Honed his skills fighting fish, but they don't seem to work well on humans.

name: Slasher Group Crew Green Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Did some cooking in the galley and now his knife skills are top class.

name: Striker Group Crew Green Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Has the ability to spin his spear around.

name: Bazooka Millions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Frontier Agents. Only recently learned about the group's generous company travel program.

name: Bazooka Billions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Officer Agents. Works hard for the group, hoping to become a numbered agent and team up with a cute female partner.

name: Striker Group Cabin Boy Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. He's got the will to fight, but not the skill.

name: Striker Group Crew Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinks he's discovered the power of his "Third Eye".

name: Knuckle Apprentice Navy
desc: Navy Seaman Apprentice. He's really into weight training.

name: Knuckle Seaman Navy
desc: Navy Seaman. Good at boxing, so he uses brass knuckles. Can't sleep if he misses his weight training.

name: Knuckle Ensign Navy HQ
desc: Navy HQ ensign. He wears a white coat with "Justice" written on the back. Naturally, he wears it without putting his arms through the sleeves.

name: Bearded Bodyguard
desc: Bearded bodyguard of Kaya's mansion. If anything happens inside the mansion, he comes running. When Usopp came with news about Kuro's plans, he tried to throw him out.

name: Cannoneer Apprentice Navy
desc: Navy Seaman Apprentice. The recoil almost knocks him down, so he's self-conscious of his superior officer's gaze.

name: Cannoneer Seaman Navy
desc: Navy Seaman. The cannon callus on his fingers are his mark of pride.

name: Bazooka Ensign Navy HQ
desc: Navy HQ ensign. He wears a white coat with "Justice" written on the back. He's proud to have reached the class of "Navy Major".

name: Striker Group Cabin Boy Red Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. In combat, all he does is swing his weapon as hard as he can.

name: Striker Group Crew Red Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinks mowing down enemies in a melee is better than one-on-one combat.

name: Gaimon
desc: Guardian of an island filled with strange animals. A former pirate, he tumbled down from a cliff into an empty treasure chest and got stuck in it. He dreamt for years of opening the treasure chest but there was nothing in it.
specDesc: Changes neighboring character's slot to [RCV] slot
capDesc: Damage from Shooter-class characters reduced by 30%

name: Johnny
desc: Once a pirate-hunting bounty hunter along with Zoro. He's Yosaku's friend and, though he stands up to strong foes, always seems to lose by a hair.
specDesc: Changes neighboring character's slot to [RCV] slot

name: Fighter Group Cabin Boy Green Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Trained in hand-to-hand combat, but has no actual experience.

name: Fighter Group Crew Green Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Confident that his rope work is the best amongst the crew.

name: Pistol Millions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Frontier Agents. Due to strict confidentiality rules, he can't even chat up the lady that caught his eye the other day.

name: Pistol Billions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Officer Agents. A big fan of the group's wing-and-rapier flag.

name: Halberd Apprentice Navy
desc: Navy Seaman Apprentice. Secretly made a mark on the handle of his weapon to show him where to hold it.

name: Halberd Seaman Navy
desc: Navy Seaman. Highly skilled with a spear, he spends his free time training alone on the deck.

name: Halberd Ensign Navy HQ
desc: Navy HQ ensign. He wears a white coat with "Justice" written on the back. He secretly tucks in the coat before battle so it doesn't get in the way.

name: Saber Millions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. She works below the Frontier Agents. A card-carrying member of Miss Valentine's fan club.

name: Saber Billions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. She works below the Officer Agents. Reckons herself stronger than the two-digit number agents by now.

name: Polearm Millions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Frontier Agents. A former bounty hunter, he accepted an offer from the group so he could earn a more stable income.

name: Halberd Billions Baroque Works
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He works below the Officer Agents. Saving up to afford his very own Devil Fruit.

name: Yosaku
desc: Johnny's friend and bounty hunter. He was close to death from scurvy but was saved by Nami. He idolizes the Straw Hat crew as older brothers.

name: Momoo
desc: Arlong Pirates Combat Monster. A sea monster from the Grand Line. Beaten by Luffy and Sanji near Arlong Park.

name: Momoo
desc: Arlong Pirates Combat Monster. A sea monster from the Grand Line. Beaten by Luffy and Sanji near Arlong Park.

name: Miss Valentine 10,000 Kilo Guillotine
desc: Baroque Works agent. Kilo-Kilo Fruit user and friend of Mr. 5. She can change her weight at will. After the Whiskey Peak failure, she chases Vivi to Little Garden.

name: Roronoa Zoro Pound Phoenix
desc: Three-Sword Style swordsman and member of the Straw Hat Pirates. He uses a powerful sword technique called 36 Pound Phoenix. Once he goes to sleep, even a typhoon won't wake him.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in DEX damage to all enemies

name: Roronoa Zoro Ashura Ichibugin
desc: Three-Sword Style swordsman and member of the Straw Hat Pirates. He can use a frighteningly powerful technique called "Demon Aura Nine-Sword Style Ashura". He understands the "Breath of All Things" and can cut through iron.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in DEX damage to all enemies
capDesc: DEX type characters' ATK and HP x 2

name: Izo
desc: 16th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. The Whitebeard Pirates have 1600 men and 16 divisions, and he commands one of them. Dresses like a woman, with a kimono and Kabuki-style hair.
specDesc: Changes STR and QCK slots to DEX slots
capDesc: Doubles DEX character ATK and RCV

name: Flintlock Pistols Izo
desc: 16th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Fights using two flintlock pistols. Izo also upholds the crew's one iron clad rule of never killing their allies.
specDesc: Changes STR and QCK slots to DEX slots
capDesc: Doubles DEX character ATK and RCV

name: Dracule Mihawk
desc: One of the Royal Seven Warlords of the Sea, fabled to be the best swordsman in the world. Once routed a 5000-man- strong force all by himself. He has high hopes for Zoro and told him to strive to take his place as world’s greatest swordsman.

name: Hawk Eyes Mihawk
desc: One of the Royal Seven Warlords of the Sea, fabled to be the best swordsman in the world. Travels the world on his small Coffin Boat with the all-powerful black blade "Night" on his back. Shanks was his rivals until he lost his left arm.

name: Marco
desc: 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. A member of the Whitebeard Pirates for over 20 years, he feels an obligation to whitebeard. Trusted implicitly by Whitebeard and the rest of the crew, he acts as a second in command.
capDesc: Triples PSY character ATK if HP is full before attacking

name: Marco the Phoenix
desc: 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Also known as "Marco the Phoenix." Endowed with the powers of a Devil Fruit, he is able to transform into a phoenix. In his phoenix form, he can withstand any attack and regenerate any wounds.
capDesc: Triples PSY character ATK if HP is full before attacking

name: Mr. 2 Bon Clay Bombardier Arabesque
desc: Baroque Works officer agent. Clone-Clone Fruit user. He wears clothes that say "Man" on the back, but he speaks in a feminine manner. He uses a style of fighting called "Oh Come My Way Karate".
capName: Oh Come My Way Karate Master
capDesc: PSY ATK to character reduced by 20%

name: Mr. 5 Breeze Breath Bomb
desc: Baroque Works officer agent. User of Bomb-Bomb Fruit. He can shoot rapid fire with his flintlock .44 caliber 6 shot revolver and the bullets are invisible.?
specDesc: 20x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Jozu
desc: 3rd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Endowed with Devil Fruit powers that enable him to turn his body into diamond. Attacks with superhuman power and speed. Uses Armament Haki.
specDesc: Nullifies DEX type attacks for 1 turn
capDesc: Doubles QCK character ATK and HP

name: Diamond Jozu
desc: 3rd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Also known as "Diamond Jozu." Endowed with Devil Fruit powers that enable him to turn his body into diamond. A member of the Whitebeard Pirates for over 20 years.
specDesc: Nullifies DEX type attacks for 1 turn
capDesc: Doubles QCK character ATK and HP

name: Nami
desc: Pirate and thief. An expert at meteorology and navigation, her favorite things are money and tangerines. She's despised pirates ever since some of them took over her hometown.
capDesc: INT ATK to character reduced by 20%

name: Siam
desc: Black Cat Pirate and member of the "Meowban Brothers" along with his friend, Butchie. Their secret weapon is the "Cat Snatch" where he suddenly steals an opponent's weapon.

name: Butchie
desc: One-half of the Black Cat Pirates "Meowban Brothers". He is normally on guard with Siam. His special move, "Cat-A-Pult Cat-Astrophe" is strong enough to split the earth.
specDesc: 3x character's ATK in STR damage to all enemies

name: Don Krieg
desc: Pirate Fleet admiral "Don Krieg". He'll do anything to win and refuses to accept criticism. After losing nearly his entire fleet of 5,000 ships, he fled from the Grand Line.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in INT damage to one enemy

name: Nefertari Vivi
desc: Princess of Alabasta Kingdom. Sensing danger to her kingdom, she infiltrated Baroque Works. Her code name at the time was "Miss Wednesday".
capDesc: RCV x 3 HP recovered after end of turn.

name: Princess Vivi
desc: Princess of Alabasta Kingdom. Along with the Straw Hat Pirates, she saves her homeland from Baroque Works' plot. Afterwards, she returns to her kingdom to fulfill her duties.
capDesc: After turn, RCV x 5 healed in HP

name: Chef Zeff
desc: Chef at the ocean-going restaurant, Baratie. With his peg leg, he can kick hard enough to drill a hole through the ship's deck. His cooking skills are top notch.

name: Buggy
desc: Captain of the Buggy Pirates. Chop-Chop Fruit user. He can split his body into pieces and make them fly through the air, but his legs stay on the ground.

name: Buggy the Clown
desc: Captain of the Buggy Pirates. His nickname is "Buggy the Clown". He gets angry when someone makes fun of his nose. He used to be on the same ship with Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Nico Robin
desc: Straw Hat Pirates archaeologist. She uses the Flower-Flower Fruit and is able to sprout parts of her body anywhere. She's searching for the Poneglyph.

name: Miss Goldenweek Colors Trap: Calming Green
desc: Baroque Works agent. She can manipulate emotions using paint. In combat, her pet pterodactyl fights for her. She's friends with Mr. 3.
specDesc: For 2 turns, halves all enemies' DEF
capDesc: DEX type characters' HP and RCV x 1.2

name: Shanks
desc: Red-Hair Pirates captain. He lets most things go with a laugh, but won't tolerate those that hurt his friends. He loses his left arm saving Luffy from the Master of the Near Sea.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in PSY damage to all enemies

name: Red-Haired Shanks
desc: Leader of the Red-Hair Pirates and one of the Four Emperors. As a young man, he was an apprentice with the Roger Pirates. He was rivals with Mihawk until he lost his left arm and their unsettled final duel is legendary.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in PSY damage to all enemies

name: Dancing Django
desc: Black Cat former captain and hypnotist. Before he became a pirate, he wanted to become a dancer. He wins the dance competition on Mirrorball Island.

name: Captain Kuro
desc: Butler who works for Kaya. His true identity is Captain Kuro, a pirate who was thought to have been executed by the Navy. He adjusts his glasses with his palms so as not to scratch them with his Cat Claws.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in QCK damage to all enemies

name: Kuro of a Hundred Plans
desc: Black Cat Pirates captain. He hatches all sorts of plans that never fail. He was thought dead after being captured by the Navy three years ago.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in QCK damage to all enemies

name: Gin the Man-Demon
desc: Krieg Pirates combat commander. He's called "Man-Demon" because of his lack of mercy. He was unable to kill Sanji, the first person to be nice to him.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in QCK damage to one enemy
capDesc: QCK ATK to character reduced by 50%

name: Sanji Diable Jambe Flambe
desc: Straw Hat Pirate chef and kick master. "Black-Leg Sanji". A gentleman among gentlemen who won't strike a woman even if his life is at stake.
capDesc: QCK type characters' ATK and HP x 1.5

name: Miss All Sunday Baroque Works VP
desc: Vice President of Baroque Works and highest-level officer. Partner of the president, Mr. 0. Her actions are mysterious, pursuing Princess Vivi, but giving her an Eternal Pose near Alabasta.

name: Double Crosser Django
desc: A master hypnotist and ex-captain of the Black Cat Pirates. Became friends with Fullbody during a dance competition on Mirrorball Island. After being arrested and subsequently saved by Fullbody, he joined the Navy.

name: Double Ironfist Fullbody
desc: A former Navy lieutenant now serving as a seaman recruit. He befriended the pirate Django at Mirrorball Island. He arrested Django later, but was demoted when he objected to his execution.

name: Miss Wednesday
desc: Agent for the criminal organization, "Baroque Works". Hunted Island Whales for food. Her partner is Mr. 9.
capDesc: RCV x 2 HP recovered after end of turn.

name: Escapee Morgan
desc: Former Navy captain and Helmeppo's father. He ruled over Shells Town with an iron fist, striking terror into its citizens, before he was defeated by Luffy and captured by his own men. He later escaped while being transported to Navy HQ. Whereabouts currently unknown.
capDesc: Boosts HP of Slasher-class characters by 1.5x

name: Axe-Hand Morgan
desc: Navy captain and father of Helmeppo. Nicknamed "Axe-Hand Morgan", he was effective dictator of Shells Town.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Mr. 3 Extra Special Candelabra
desc: Baroque Works officer agent. Wax-Wax Fruit user. When the wax from inside his body hardens over him, his skin becomes as hard as iron, but he's vulnerable to fire. His friend is Miss Goldenweek.
specDesc: Delays all enemies' attacks for 1 turn
capDesc: INT ATK to character reduced by 10%

name: Mohji & Richie
desc: Buggy Pirates first mate Mohji and his pet lion, Richie. Beast tamer Mohji fights alongside Richie who follows his commands. He burned down a pet shop in Orange Town.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in PSY damage to one enemy

name: Nami Fine Tempo
desc: The navigator for the Straw Hat Pirates. Igaram enlisted her to protect Princess Vivi at Whiskey Peak. She can press a button on her Clima-Tact to unleash a pair of doves.

name: Sogeking
desc: The mysterious Sniper King, who hides his true identity behind a mask. He pretends to be Usopp's close friend but is actually Usopp himself. Luffy and Chopper don't seem to have figured it out.
specDesc: Delays all enemies' attacks for 3 turns and deals 15x character's ATK in PSY damage to all enemies
capDesc: PSY type characters' ATK and HP x 1.5

name: Fire Pearl
desc: Krieg Pirates second unit commander. Since he's never shed a drop of blood, even a nosebleed sends him into a panic. Raised in a jungle, he has the habit of igniting when he senses danger.
capDesc: STR ATK to character reduced by 50%

name: Portgas D. Ace
desc: Whitebeard Pirates 2nd Division commander. Luffy's older brother by three years. His specialty is falling asleep while eating.
specDesc: 25x character's ATK in QCK damage to one enemy

name: Portgas D. Ace Flame Mirror
desc: Whitebeard Pirates 2nd Division commander. Nicknamed "Fire Fist Ace", he uses Flame-Flame Fruit. His plan is to make Whitebeard, his benefactor, the Pirate King.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in QCK to all enemies

name: Tony Tony Chopper Guard Point
desc: Straw Hat Pirates doctor. A reindeer that ate a Devil Fruit, the Human-Human Fruit. Guard Point covers his entire body with long fluffy fur for protection.

name: Kuroobi
desc: Arlong Pirates officer and ray Fishman. He is a 40th rank practitioner of traditional Fishman Island karate. Very cautious, he didn't even trust Nami, a fellow Arlong Pirates officer.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Monkey D. Luffy Gum-Gum Balloon
desc: The captain of the Straw Hat Pirates, out on a journey to become Pirate King. His rubber body can deflect projectiles and cushion him from falls.
specDesc: Cut damage taken by 50% for 3 turns

name: Monkey D. Luffy Gear Third
desc: The captain of the Straw Hat Pirates. His "Gear" skill lets him temporarily boost his body's abilities, although it has the side effect of shrinking him afterward.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in STR damage to all foes
capDesc: Score 3 Perfects in a row to boost character's ATK 3.5x

name: Monkey D. Luffy Gum-Gum Pistol
desc: Leader of the Straw Hat Pirates, his goal is to become Pirate King. After eating the Gum- Gum Fruit, he sharpened his fighting skills for 10 years before leaving Fushia Village.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Monkey D. Luffy Gear 2
desc: Leader of the Straw Hat Pirates. After being defeated by Aokiji, he developed a technique called "Gear" that temporarily boosts his strength.
specDesc: 25x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Nami Happiness Punch
desc: The navigator for the Straw Hat Pirates. Her Happiness Punch can floor any man in a single strike, and she charges 100,000 berries per person.

name: Tony Tony Chopper
desc: A reindeer that ate the Human- Human Devil Fruit. He can change into beast form, human form or a hybrid form. His goal is to become a doctor who can cure any illness.
specDesc: Changes neighboring character's slot to [RCV] slot

name: Tony Tony Chopper Heavy Point
desc: Straw Hat Pirates doctor. A reindeer that ate the Human-Human Devil Fruit. When he uses Heavy Point, he becomes much larger and stronger.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in PSY damage to one enemy

name: Tony Tony Chopper Arm Point
desc: Straw Hat Pirate doctor. A reindeer that ate a Devil Fruit, the Human-Human Fruit. His arms and upper body become massively powerful allowing him to unleash furious strikes.
specDesc: For 2 turns, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Tony Tony Chopper Horn Point
desc: Straw Hat Pirates doctor. A reindeer that ate a Devil Fruit, the Human-Human Fruit. With Horn Point, his horns are powered up, allowing him to do powerful horn attacks.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in QCK damage to all enemies

name: Mr. 9 Hot Blooded Bat
desc: An agent of the shadowy Baroque Works organization who wields a pair of bats. He rose to defend his old partner Ms. Wednesday after an assassin was sent to kill her for treason.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in QCK damage to one enemy
capDesc: Boosts ATK of Striker-type characters by 1.5x

name: Chef Sanji Hot Rock Stew
desc: Straw Hat Pirates chef. He has a weakness for women. On the Sky Islands, he's able to create impressive meals even without proper cooking facilities.
specDesc: Heals character HP by 10x their RCV

name: Pistol Bandit
desc: Mountain bandit and underling of Higuma. He was no match at all for Benn Beckman and the Red Hair Pirates.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in Character-type damage to all enemies

name: Shooter Group Cabin Boy Red Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Thinks his powerful pistol is cool.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in Character-type damage to all enemies

name: Shooter Group Cabin Boy Black Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Thinks attacking from behind is the ultimate attack.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in Character-type damage to all enemies

name: Shooter Group Crew Red Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Super proud that he can handle his high-powered pistol with just one hand.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in Character-type damage to all enemies

name: Shooter Group Crew Black Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Always researching the most effective ways to become a better shooter.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in Character-type damage to all enemies

name: Pistol Fishman Arlong crewmember
desc: Arlong Pirate Fishman crewmember. Fishmen are born with the strength of 10 humans.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in Character-type damage to all enemies

name: Higuma
desc: Mountain bandit leader near Fushia Village. He had an 8 million Beli bounty on his head and was eaten by a Neptunian after fleeing from the Red-Hair Pirates.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Sword Bandit
desc: Mountain bandit and underling of Higuma. Just like his leader, Higuma, he was making fun of Shanks and his crew.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Slasher Group Cabin Boy Red Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Bashes rather than slashes, so he tends to nick his blade a lot.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Slasher Group Cabin Boy Black Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Considering coating his sword with poison, but is afraid he might stick himself.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Slasher Group Crew Red Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinks two swords give him perfect attack and defense.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Slasher Group Crew Black Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Loves to make his enemies go crazy.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Sword Fishman Arlong crewmember
desc: Arlong Pirate Fishman crewmember. He challenges the Straw Hat Pirates but is blown away by Luffy and the sea cow, Momoo.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Striker Group Cabin Boy Black Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Searches for his enemies' weak points.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Striker Group Crew Black Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinking about remodeling his weapon so he can do surprise attacks.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Spear Fishman Arlong crewmember
desc: Arlong Pirate Fishman crewmember. He captured Zoro when he came to save Nami, but is defeated while Arlong was away.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Master of the Near Sea
desc: Neptunian near Fushia Village. He attacked Luffy but ran away afterward, frightened by Shanks' withering gaze.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Iron Fist Fullbody
desc: Navy officer "Iron Fist Fullbody". He was embarrassed when he was corrected by Sanji during a date on the Baratie. When he retaliated by ruining Sanji's meal, he was beaten down for it.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Fighter Group Cabin Boy Red Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Famous for his strength in his hometown.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Fighter Group Cabin Boy Black Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Always likes to fight dirty.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Fighter Group Crew Red Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Proud of the muscles he gained from carrying cargo.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Fighter Group Crew Black Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinks it's okay to do anything to win.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Karate Fishman Arlong crewmember
desc: Arlong Pirate Fishman crewmember. He thinks of humans as inferior.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in Character-type damage to one enemy

name: Mr. 8 Igarappapa
desc: Once an agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization, he was actually captain of the Alabasta royal guard, infiltrating Baroque Works alongside Princess Vivi. When they were unmasked, he left Vivi in the Straw Hats' hands and disguised himself as the princess instead.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in PSY damage to all foes
capDesc: Boosts HP of PSY characters by 2x

name: Usopp Impact
desc: The sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates. A crack shot with nimble fingers and a unique gift for making up lies. The special shells he took back from Skypiea are used on his and Nami's equipment.

name: Iron-Mace Alvida
desc: Leader of the Alvida Pirates. Nicknamed "Iron Mace Alvida", she thinks she is the most beautiful on the high seas.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy
capDesc: STR ATK to character reduced by 30%

name: Fighter Group Cabin Boy Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Confident in his ability to flee.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Fighter Group Cabin Boy Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. Plenty of fighting spirit, but expends a lot of wasted effort.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Cannoneer Cabin Boy
desc: Pirate new recruit. Started handling cannons after he joined. He loves to eat--and it shows.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Fighter Group Crew Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Great sense of balance from working in the rigging.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Fighter Group Crew Yellow Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. He's learned patience from scrubbing the deck daily.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Cannoneer Skilled
desc: Pirate fighter. A skilled cannoneer. His motto is "Drink big, shoot big".
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Fighter Group Leader
desc: Pirate who excels at hand-to-hand combat. He has the physical strength to justify the bounty on his head.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Slasher Group Leader
desc: Pirate who excels at sword fighting. Very powerful fighter who formed his own pirate group in the past.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Striker Group Leader
desc: Pirate who excels at axe fighting. Brutal fighter who loves to chop up people.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Shooter Group Leader
desc: Pirate who excels at sharpshooting. His prey can't escape the aim of his double pistols.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Assassin Master
desc: Pirate who excels at assassination. He uses a bowgun to take out his targets.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces damage taken by 20%

name: Hina
desc: Captain at the Navy HQ. She is friends with Smoker, who joined the Navy alongside her. Unlike the troublemaking Smoker, she has been an exemplary officer. Fullbody and her other underlings have a crush on her, but she coldly turns them away.
specDesc: Keep all allies' Slots locked for 1 turn

name: Black Cage Hina
desc: Navy HQ captain and user of the Bind- Bind Fruit, which turns her body into an iron cage to entrap her foes with. After the fall of Baroque Works, she ambushed the Straw Hats as they tried to leave Alabasta.
specDesc: Keep all allies' Slots locked for 1 turn

name: Usopp
desc: Young man who formed the Usopp Pirates. He wants to become a "brave warrior of the sea" like his father, Yasopp. His daily lies help awaken the residents of Syrup Village each morning.
specDesc: Delays all enemies' attacks for 1 turn

name: Knuckle Punk Black Cat Pirates
desc: Black Cat Pirates crewmember. He gets angry when Captain Kuro's plans don't go according to schedule.

name: Saber Punk Black Cat Pirates
desc: Black Cat Pirates crewmember. He gets powered up by Django's hypnosis.

name: Halberd Punk Black Cat Pirates
desc: Black Cat Pirates crewmember. He tried to attack Syrup Village following Captain Kuro's plan.

name: Pistol Punk Black Cat Pirates
desc: Black Cat Pirates crewmember. He keeps getting hit by Captain Kuro's "Death Scoop" over and over.

name: Cannoneer Punk Black Cat Pirates
desc: Black Cat Pirates crewmember. He loves to wear black cat ears.

name: Saber Apprentice Navy
desc: Navy Seaman Apprentice. Until he joined the navy, he thought "Saber" was a kind of food.

name: Pistol Apprentice Navy
desc: Navy Seaman Apprentice. During combat, he's always worried about accidentally hitting an ally.

name: Saber Seaman Navy
desc: Navy Seaman. Skilled at sword fighting, so he uses a saber. Just for once, he wants to try using a katana.

name: Pistol Seaman Navy
desc: Navy Seaman. A great marksman, his weapon is a pistol. To maintain his good vision, he eats lots of carrots.

name: Saber Ensign Navy HQ
desc: Navy HQ ensign. He wears a white coat with "Justice" written on the back. He wears his scabbard so that he can draw his saber smoothly.

name: Pistol Ensign Navy HQ
desc: Navy HQ ensign. He wears a white coat with "Justice" written on the back. He counts stars to train his eyesight.
capDesc: PSY ATK to character reduced by 20%

name: Roronoa Zoro Lion's Song
desc: The swordsman of the Straw Hat Pirates. Often fights with three swords at once, although he also boasts many single and dual-sword skills. For this single-sword technique, he follows his foe's breathing to unleash a powerful slash.
specDesc: 25x character's ATK in DEX damage to 1 foe
capDesc: Greatly cut damage taken when HP is full

name: Choo
desc: Arlong Pirates officer and smelt Fishman. He has the habit of saying "Smek" at the end of his sentences. He ran down Usopp by firing a powerful blast of water from his mouth.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in INT damage to all enemies

name: Don Krieg Poison Gas Bomb MH5
desc: Commander of the Krieg Pirates. Equipped with every type of weapon, he tries to crush enemies with overwhelming power. He cruelly uses his own allies to achieve victory.

name: Nami Mirage tempo
desc: Straw Hat Pirates navigator. She asked Usopp to make her a bo staff as a weapon to fight the powerful enemies in Alabasta.

name: Mr. Prince Mutton Shot
desc: The name Sanji called himself when he spoke to Crocodile. He infiltrated Rain Dinners to save Luffy and his crew, and contacted Miss All Sunday's Baby Transponder Snail to lure out Crocodile.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in SPD damage to 1 foe
capDesc: Score 2 Perfects in a row to boost character's ATK by 2x

name: Six-Sword Hachi
desc: Arlong Pirates officer and octopus Fishman. He is a Six-Sword Style practitioner with each sword weighing 300kg. He's a good person who doesn't hate anyone.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in DEX damage to all enemies
capDesc: DEX ATK to character reduced by 50%

name: Mr. 5 Nez-Palm Cannon
desc: Baroque Works officer agent. With the Bomb-Bomb Fruit, he is able to make any part of his body explode. He tried to kill Vivi when she found out Mr. 0's true identity.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Coby
desc: Alvida Pirates cabin boy and navigator. Thinking it was a fishing boat, he boarded a pirate ship and was forced to become their cabin boy. He was too frightened of the crew to run away.
capDesc: After turn, RCV x 2 healed in HP

name: Helmeppo
desc: Son of Axe-Hand Morgan. With the authority of his father, he ran amok in town. After Luffy found out he lied to Zoro, he beat him up for it.
capDesc: INT ATK to character reduced by 30%

name: Carne
desc: Cook and member of the "Gangster Combo" with Patty. He pilots a naval weapon called "Mackerel Head #1". Along with Patty, he often challenges Sanji but is always beaten.
capDesc: After turn, RCV x 3 healed in HP

name: Gin
desc: Pirate captured by the Navy who managed to escape. When he arrived at Baratie, he was starving and near death. He was thrown out by Patty but Sanji fed him and saved his life.
capDesc: QCK ATK to character reduced by 30%

name: Pearl
desc: Krieg Pirates second unit commander. He's called "Pearl the Iron Wall" for his strong defense that's capable of withstanding cannons. He has won every battle unscathed without shedding a single drop of blood.
capDesc: STR ATK to character reduced by 30%

name: Hatchan
desc: Arlong Pirates officer and octopus Fishman. Unlike other Fishmen, he doesn't have a bad impression of humans.
capDesc: DEX ATK to character reduced by 30%

name: Red Robber Penguin
desc: Penguin with a penchant for stealing. Be careful when approaching it as it may suddenly head butt you.

name: Blue Robber Penguin
desc: Penguin with a penchant for stealing. It has a calm temperament and sleeps a lot. If woken, it gets quite vicious and will attack.

name: Green Robber Penguin
desc: Penguin with a penchant for stealing. Always on high alert, when it sees a human, it tries to intimidate them.

name: Yellow Robber Penguin
desc: Penguin with a penchant for stealing. Normally quiet and absent-minded, when it is hungry it can become the most violent of all penguins.

name: Black Robber Penguin
desc: Penguin with a penchant for stealing. Though it doesn't particularly want the items, it will attack viciously if they are taken back.

name: Rainbow Robber Penguin
desc: Penguin with a penchant for stealing. Very little is known about them since they rarely show themselves to humans.

name: Red Pirate Penguin
desc: Evolved form of Red Robber Penguin. It often carries its favorite food, Bluefin tuna. It loves to play and, if approached, will swing the fish in excitement.

name: Blue Pirate Penguin
desc: Evolved form of Blue Robber Penguin. Almost always sleeping. Its main food is skipjack tuna. Wakes up very grumpily and may attack, so be careful.

name: Green Pirate Penguin
desc: Evolved form of Green Robber Penguin. If it senses any danger, it goes on a rampage. Quite smart, and its main food is yellowtail tuna.

name: Yellow Pirate Penguin
desc: Evolved form of Yellow Robber Penguin. They say that its odd behavior increases along with its growth. Its main food is mackerel.

name: Black Pirate Penguin
desc: Evolved form of Black Robber Penguin. It can't catch fish on its own, so it steals them from fishermen's nets or takes other animals' food. Its favorite food is sea bream.

name: Red Hermit Crab
desc: Giant red hermit crab. Aggressively attacks by ramming with its hard shell. Legends say you'll get good luck if you drink broth made by boiling its shell.

name: Blue Hermit Crab
desc: Giant blue hermit crab. It loves coconuts but hates humans. Legends say you'll get good luck if you drink broth made by boiling its shell.

name: Green Hermit Crab
desc: Giant green hermit crab. It's extremely wary and doesn't show itself to humans. Legends say you'll get good luck if you drink broth made by boiling its shell.

name: Yellow Hermit Crab
desc: Giant yellow hermit crab. Its shiny shell is a popular item for interior design. Legends say you'll get good luck if you drink broth made by boiling its shell.

name: Black Hermit Crab
desc: Giant black hermit crab. Its hard shell can be worn, as is, as a helmet. Legends say you'll get good luck if you drink broth made by boiling its shell.

name: Rainbow Hermit Crab
desc: Giant rainbow hermit crab. It's highly rare and very few can be found on the ocean floor. Legends say you'll get good luck if you drink broth made by boiling its shell.

name: Red Armored Crab
desc: Giant ferocious red armored crab. Its powerful claws can crush a galleon. It brings good luck but, despite its size, doesn't have much meat on it for eating.

name: Blue Armored Crab
desc: Giant ferocious blue armored crab. Its shell is so hard that weapons can't penetrate it. It brings good luck but, despite its size, doesn't have much meat on it for eating.

name: Green Armored Crab
desc: Giant ferocious green armored crab. It's very territorial and attacks anything that approaches. It brings good luck but, despite its size, doesn't have much meat on it for eating.

name: Yellow Armored Crab
desc: Giant ferocious yellow armored crab. Its shiny shell is as beautiful as a precious gem. It brings good luck but, despite its size, doesn't have much meat on it for eating.

name: Black Armored Crab
desc: Giant ferocious black armored crab. Its hard black shell can be used to make armor. It brings good luck but, despite its size, doesn't have much meat on it for eating.

name: Red Striped Dragon
desc: Red striped dragon. Eating one of its scales is said to grant new strength. It's the fiercest of all the giant Neptunians.

name: Blue Striped Dragon
desc: Blue striped dragon. Eating one of its scales is said to grant new strength. It swims so quickly that no one has ever actually seen it.

name: Green Striped Dragon
desc: Green striped dragon. Eating one of its scales is said to grant new strength. As an herbivore, it is the most gentle-natured of all dragons.

name: Yellow Striped Dragon
desc: Yellow striped dragon. Eating one of its scales is said to grant new strength. It is said to have the intelligence of humans.

name: Black Striped Dragon
desc: Black striped dragon. Eating one of its scales is said to grant new strength. It has an extremely ferocious nature.

name: Red Treasure Turtle
desc: Giant red-shelled turtle. It instinctively slams into anything that shines. It improves brain functioning if cooked and eaten.

name: Blue Treasure Turtle
desc: Giant blue-shelled turtle. Unlike other turtles, it can move quickly even on land. It improves brain functioning if cooked and eaten.

name: Green Treasure Turtle
desc: Giant green-shelled turtle. It gathers with others on the same beach and lays a large number of eggs. It improves brain functioning if cooked and eaten.

name: Yellow Treasure Turtle
desc: Giant yellow-shelled turtle. Because of its incautious nature, it can sometimes be found sunbathing on the beach. It improves brain functioning if cooked and eaten.

name: Black Treasure Turtle
desc: Giant black-shelled turtle. It floats on the surface, pretending to be dead, and then bites whatever touches it. It improves brain functioning if cooked and eaten.

name: Red Daimyo Turtle
desc: Hundred-year-old red-shelled turtle. Some places still have fables about it spitting fire. As food, it's highly nutritious and can improve memory.

name: Blue Daimyo Turtle
desc: Hundred-year-old blue-shelled turtle. If approached, it pulls in its limbs and spins fast to intimidate. As food, it's highly nutritious and can improve memory.

name: Green Daimyo Turtle
desc: Hundred-year-old green-shelled turtle. It can propel itself out of water to capture its prey on the surface. As food, it's highly nutritious and can improve memory.

name: Yellow Daimyo Turtle
desc: Hundred-year-old yellow-shelled turtle. When it locates a ship, it swims around the area. As food, it's highly nutritious and can improve memory.

name: Black Daimyo Turtle
desc: Hundred-year-old black-shelled turtle. It floats to the surface of the ocean at night and submerges back in the morning. As food, it's highly nutritious and can improve memory.

name: Sea Pony
desc: A very delicious type of fish. Very expensive due to the difficulty in catching it. Besides being very nutritious, it's a great source for evolving new types of fish.

name: Sea Colt
desc: Evolved Sea Pony and extremely delicious. Since they're hard to even find, it's an ultra-luxury food item that most will never taste. Highly effective as a restorative drug.

name: Sea Horse
desc: Evolved Sea Colt and legendary material. So delicious that once you eat it, you'll never be able to eat another fish. Eat it and you'll never suffer from any illness again.

name: Sea Stallion
desc: Legendary creature said to be the guardian of the sea. No one knows where it lives. It is said to confer long life.

name: Red Elder Turtle
desc: Thousand-year-old red-shelled turtle. Records say it moved an island after colliding into it. Its shell is used to make medicine for improving intelligence.

name: Blue Elder Turtle
desc: Thousand-year-old blue-shelled turtle. Due to its rapid rising and submerging, it can create whirlpools. Its shell is used to make medicine for improving intelligence.

name: Green Elder Turtle
desc: Thousand-year-old green-shelled turtle. It sleeps for such long periods that it is commonly mistaken for an island. Its shell is used to make medicine for improving intelligence.

name: Yellow Elder Turtle
desc: Thousand-year-old yellow-shelled turtle. Its curious nature causes it to chase after ships or other living creatures. Its shell is used to make medicine for improving intelligence.

name: Black Elder Turtle
desc: Thousand-year-old black-shelled turtle. It lives deep in the ocean and so is rarely seen. Its shell is used to make medicine for improving intelligence.

name: Miss Valentine
desc: Baroque Works agent. She uses Kilo-Kilo Fruit and is friend with Mr. 5. Her mission at Whiskey Peak was ruined when she got wrapped up in a fight between Luffy and Zoro.

name: Mr. 3
desc: Baroque Works officer agent. Selected as No. 3 due to his ability to execute highly detailed plans. Eating the Wax-Wax Fruit turned him into a Candle Man. His friend is Miss Goldenweek.
capDesc: INT ATK to character reduced by 10%

name: Miss Goldenweek
desc: Baroque Works agent. She's not a Devil Fruit user, but is a painter that is able to turn emotional colors into reality. She's friends with Mr. 3.
capDesc: DEX type characters' HP and RCV x 1.2

name: Mr. 2 Bon Clay
desc: Baroque Works officer agent. Clone-Clone Fruit user. As a cross- dresser, he has both a male and female code name. Friendship is very important to him.
capName: Oh Come My Way Karete User
capDesc: PSY ATK to character reduced by 10%

name: Mr. 9
desc: An agent of the shadowy Baroque Works organization. Hunted for Island Whale meat with his partner, Ms. Wednesday. A self-titled king.
capDesc: Boosts ATK of Striker-type characters by 1.2x

name: Mr. 8
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. He led a team of 100 bounty hunters as they pursued the Straw Hats, but ultimately wasn't even a match for Zoro alone.
capDesc: Boosts HP of PSY characters by 1.5x

name: Miss Monday
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. Mr. 8's partner, she disguised herself as a nun at Whiskey Peak, where she held a drinking contest with Nami while secretly drinking plain old fizzy tea.
capDesc: Boosts ATK of Fighter-class characters by 1.2x

name: Rainbow Pirate Penguin
desc: Adult form of Rainbow Robber Penguin. It's extremely rare and hardly ever shows itself to humans. In some regions, it is called the "Messenger of the Gods."

name: Red Jeweled Porc
desc: A wild pig native to the coast. Adults are rich sources of nutrients and excellent for promoting growth. Its favorite scarf color is red.

name: Blue Jeweled Porc
desc: A wild pig native to the coast. Adults are rich sources of nutrients and excellent for promoting growth. Its favorite scarf color is blue.

name: Green Jeweled Porc
desc: A wild pig native to the coast. Adults are rich sources of nutrients and excellent for promoting growth. Its favorite scarf color is green.

name: Yellow Jeweled Porc
desc: A wild pig native to the coast. Adults are rich sources of nutrients and excellent for promoting growth. Its favorite scarf color is yellow.

name: Black Jeweled Porc
desc: A wild pig native to the coast. Adults are rich sources of nutrients and excellent for promoting growth. Its favorite scarf color is purple.

name: Ruby Jeweled Porc
desc: Boss of the wild pigs native to the coast. Though violent and mischievous, it gets away with everything thanks to its cuteness. Its favorite color is red. The ruby it wears around its neck is passed down from boss pig to boss pig.

name: Sapphire Jeweled Porc
desc: Boss of the wild pigs native to the coast. Restless and impetuous, it can never stay in the same place for more than 3 seconds. Its favorite color is blue. The sapphire it wears around its neck is passed down from boss pig to boss pig.

name: Emerald Jeweled Porc
desc: Boss of the wild pigs native to the coast. Gentle and easygoing, it rarely attacks of its own volition. Its favorite color is green. The emerald it wears around its neck is passed down from boss pig to boss pig.

name: Topaz Jeweled Porc
desc: Boss of the wild pigs native to the coast. Rumor says that it will rescue any shipwreck survivors it finds on the beach. Its favorite color is yellow. The topaz it wears around its neck is passed down from boss pig to boss pig.

name: Amethyst Jeweled Porc
desc: Boss of the wild pigs native to the coast. Plots with its pack on the best ways to steal food from nearby houses. Its favorite color is purple. The amethyst it wears around its neck is passed down from boss pig to boss pig.

name: One-Two Django
desc: Black Cat Pirate captain. Sometimes when he does One, Two Django hypnotism, he accidentally puts himself under its spell.

name: Sanji Plastic Surgery Shot
desc: Straw Hat Pirates chef. He fights with his legs so as not to injure his cooking hands. He can use his kicks to make someone's face more handsome, but can't change the "structure of the heart".
specDesc: For 2 turns, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Blamenco
desc: 6th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. In response to Whitebeard referring to his crew as his sons, Blamenco and his subordinates lovingly call him "Pops" in return.
specDesc: Changes DEX and QCK slots to STR slots
capDesc: Doubles STR character ATK and RCV

name: Blamenco the Mallet
desc: 6th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Endowed with powers that enable him to store objects of any size in pockets on his body. Takes out a hammer from pockets on his body to fight.
specDesc: Changes DEX and QCK slots to STR slots
capDesc: Doubles STR character ATK and RCV

name: Neptunian Squid
desc: A large squid that attacked the Merry Go inside Laboon's stomach. It was quickly dispatched by a harpoon from Crocus, keeper of the Twin Capes Lighthouse.
capDesc: Boosts energy of Striker-type characters by 1.5x

name: Tashigi
desc: Swordfighter and petty officer under Smoker. She looks exactly like Zoro's childhood friend, Kuina. Her dream is to take back all named swords from villains. Her own sword is named "Downpour".
specDesc: 25x character's ATK in QCK damage to one enemy

name: Tashigi Navy HQ Ensign
desc: Marine officer and Smoker's assistant. Once she learns about Crocodile's Alabasta plan, she works with the Straw Hat Pirates to stop him. As a result, she's promoted to the rank of ensign.
specDesc: 25x character's ATK in QCK damage to one enemy

name: Vista
desc: 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Has been a member of the Whitebeard Pirates for over 20 years.
capDesc: Doubles INT character ATK and HP

name: Flower Sword Vista
desc: 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Two-Sword Style swordsman. Also known as "Flower Sword Vista." His skills are good enough to be recognized by Mihawk, the greatest swordsman in the world. Uses Armament Haki.
capDesc: Doubles INT character ATK and HP

name: Tony Tony Chopper Brain Point
desc: Straw Hat Pirates doctor. A reindeer that ate the Human-Human Devil Fruit. Brain Point turns him into human form where he can analyze his enemy's weaknesses.
specDesc: Changes neighboring character's slot to [RCV] slot

name: Edward Newgate
desc: Captain of the Whitebeard Pirates and one of the Four Emperors. The strongest pirate in the world, he was able to hold his own against Pirate King Roger and is said to be the one closest to the One Piece.
specDesc: Reduces HP of all enemies by 30%
capName: The Power to Destroy the World
capDesc: Boosts crew's ATK by 3x when remaining HP is low

name: Whitebeard
desc: Captain of the Whitebeard Pirates and one of the Four Emperors. Real name: Edward Newgate. Endowed with Tremor-Tremor Fruit powers that enable him to create earthquakes and tsunamis. Can use Conqueror's Haki.
specDesc: Reduces HP of all enemies by 30%
capName: The Power to Destroy the World
capDesc: Boosts crew's ATK by 3x when remaining HP is low

name: Arlong
desc: Sawshark Fishman who controls the Conomi Islands. He formed the Arlong Pirates. His teeth can crush rocks and bombs and grow back quickly if broken.
specDesc: 7x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Enraged Arlong Shark On Tooth
desc: Arlong Pirates captain. Nicknamed "Arlong the Saw", he is a Fishman whose eyes resemble a Sea King when he becomes enraged.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Slasher Group Cabin Boy Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. He's fast, but sensitive about his lack of power.
specDesc: For 1 turn, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Shooter Group Cabin Boy Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate new recruit. His dream is to become the world's fastest quick draw artist.
specDesc: For 1 turn, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Slasher Group Crew Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Thinks striking and backing up quickly is the best way to fight.
specDesc: For 1 turn, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Shooter Group Crew Blue Pirates
desc: Pirate fighter. Never lost in a quick draw contest among his friends.
specDesc: For 1 turn, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Rainbow Striped Dragon
desc: Rainbow striped dragon. Eating one of its scales is said to grant new strength. These scales are so beautiful that they are like enormous jewels.
specDesc: For 1 turn, halves all enemies' DEF

name: Cabin Boy Coby
desc: Alvida Pirates former cabin boy. After being rescued by Luffy, he became a marine in Shells Town. His dream is to become a Navy officer.
capDesc: After turn, RCV x 2 healed in HP

name: Iron-Mace Alvida Smooth-Smooth Fruit
desc: Leader of the Alvida Pirates. She became beautiful by eating the Smooth-Smooth Fruit, but thinks nothing has changed other than having lost her freckles.
capDesc: STR ATK to character reduced by 50%

name: Laboon
desc: An Island Whale that blocked the Merry Go's progress after she passed the Red Line. Enraged after the bow of the ship broke off, Luffy attacked the whale, who then counterattacked and swallowed the entire ship whole.
specDesc: 20x character's ATK in STR damage to all enemies
capDesc: Your crew won't get knocked out as long as HP is above a certain level

name: Laboon (Luffy's drawing)
desc: A whale who stubbornly believed that his pirate friends would return. He repeatedly rammed the Red Line in hopes of reuniting with them, but stopped after promising Luffy another battle.
specDesc: 20x character's ATK in STR damage to all enemies
capDesc: Your crew won't get knocked out as long as HP is above a certain level

name: Sanji
desc: Assistant chef at the ocean-going restaurant, Baratie. His love for women is unmatched. He considers it his duty to feed any hungry person, no matter who they are.
specDesc: Heals character HP by 10x their HP

name: Monkey D. Luffy
desc: A boy who lives in Fushia Village. His dream is to be like the pirate Shanks. He accidentally ate Shanks' Gum-Gum Fruit and became rubberized.
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy

name: Cabin Boy Helmeppo
desc: Son of Axe-Hand Morgan. After his father, Morgan, was beaten by Luffy, the once spoiled Helmeppo joined the Navy as a new recruit.
specDesc: For 1 turn, reduces all enemies' DEF to 0
capDesc: INT ATK to character reduced by 30%

name: Roronoa Zoro Streaming Wolf Swords
desc: The Three-Sword Style swordsman of the Straw Hat Pirates. Streaming Wolf Swords parries the enemy's attack. His complete lack of direction causes him to get hopelessly lost if left to fend for himself.
capDesc: Greatly cut damage taken when HP is full

name: Miss Monday Superhuman Brass Knuckles
desc: An agent for the shadowy Baroque Works organization. Mr. 8's partner, she prides herself in her strength. She let Miss Wednesday go free, reasoning that if she'll be punished for failing the mission either way, she at least wanted to protect a friend.
specDesc: 20x character's ATK in STR damage to 1 foe
capName: The Power to Protect a Friend
capDesc: Boosts ATK of Fighter-class characters by 1.5x

name: Usopp Tabasco Star
desc: Straw Hat Pirates sniper. His top skills are lying, sniping and recruiting underlings. Chronic sufferer of "Can't-get-on-this- island disease".
specDesc: Delays all enemies' attacks for 2 turns

name: Cabaji the Acrobat
desc: Buggy Pirates second mate. Nicknamed "Cabaji the Acrobat", he is always on his unicycle and uses tops or fire to surprise his foes. The other members of the crew call that his "carnival show".
specName: The Dance Of A Hundred Kamikaze Tops
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in DEX damage to one enemy

name: Patty
desc: Fighter cook at the ocean-going restaurant, Baratie. Even when he tries to be courteous, he winds up insulting customers. He and Carne are called the "Gangster Combo".
specDesc: 5x character's ATK in STR damage to one enemy
capDesc: After turn, RCV x 3 healed in HP

name: Roronoa Zoro Three Thousand Worlds
desc: Three-Sword Style swordsman and member of the Straw Hat Pirates. A swordsman never turns his back on a foe and, after his defeat at the hands of Mihawk, he swore never to lose to him again.
specDesc: 10x character's ATK in DEX damage to all enemies

name: Nami Thunderbolt Tempo
desc: Straw Hat Pirates navigator. With her skill at meteorology, Nami was able to turn her Clima-Tact from a party trick to a masterful tool for controlling weather.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in INT damage to all enemies
capDesc: INT type characters' ATK and HP x 1.5

name: Nami Tornado Tempo
desc: Straw Hat Pirates navigator. She's an expert at meteorology and navigation. She left all the money she earned in her thieving days in her home village.
specDesc: 15x character's ATK in INT damage to one enemy

name: Usopp Golden Pound
desc: Straw Hat Pirates sniper. He's skilled at lying, sniping and recruiting underlings. His pessimistic attitude is unrivaled.
specDesc: Delays all enemies' attacks for 3 turns

name: Usopp Usopp Hammer
desc: The sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates. Besides his sniper skills, he can also use hammers and other items to stymie foes in a variety of ways. He's a coward, but he has the strength to hold his ground when the time calls for it.
specDesc: Boost PSY attacks by 1.5x for 1 turn

name: Mr. Prince Veau Shot
desc: The name Sanji called himself when he spoke to Crocodile. He fought against Mr. 3 to rescue his friends, who were held in a cage within Alabasta's Rain Dinners casino. Afterward, he used Mr. 3's powers to open the lock on the cage.
specDesc: 20x character's ATK in SPD damage to 1 foe
capDesc: Score 2 Perfects in a row to boost character's ATK by 2.5x

name: Smoker
desc: Navy HQ Captain nicknamed "Smoker the White Hunter". He uses Plume- Plume Fruit which lets him turn his body into smoke. He's confident in his ability to catch pirates, but can't stop Luffy from escaping in Loguetown

name: Smoker the White Hunter
desc: Navy HQ Captain. Luffy calls him "Smokey". He lives in Loguetown but follows the Straw Hat Pirates to the Grand Line.
